title: Flag of Turkey
cardDescription: The flag of Turkey is a red flag featuring a white star and crescent.
description: The flag of Turkey is a red flag featuring a white star and crescent. The current design of the Turkish flag is directly derived from the late Ottoman flag, which had been adopted in the late 18th century. The red represents the blood of Turkey's soldiers at the time of war they went through and how they survived.

content.content: This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.

content: With A, ch 29, sc in 2nd ch and each ch across, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 17, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sab, sc 6, sba, sc 6, turn
Ch 1, sc 4, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 2, sab, sc 1, sba, sc 14, turn
Ch 1, sc 20, sab, sc 1, sba, sc 5, turn
Ch 1, sc 3, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 7, sab, sba, sc 12, turn
Ch 1, sc 10, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 7, sab, sc 1, sba, sc 4, turn
Ch 1, sc 3, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 7, sab, sba, sc 12, turn
Ch 1, sc 20, sab, sc 1, sba, sc 5, turn
Ch 1, sc 4, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 2, sab, sc 1, sba, sc 14, turn
Ch 1, sc 14, sab, sc 6, sba, sc 6, turn
Ch 1, sc 7, sab, sc 2, sba, sc 17, turn
